data.title: The National Memo Advertising Mediakits, Reviews, Pricing, Traffic, Rate Card Cost
data.meta_description: The National Memo Mediakits, Reviews, Cost, Contacts, Traffic (302k Visits/Mo), Ads.txt. Pricing models include CPM supporting ads on Desktop Display, Social, Mobile Display, Email channels
data.text:
The National Memo advertising reaches 302k visitors across desktop and mobile web, in countries such as United States, Brazil, Canada, Thailand, Australia. Pricing models they offer are CPM on channels such as Display, Social, Mobile, Email Advertising on The National Memo will allow you to reach consumers in industries or verticals such as Government & Politics.

They are headquartered at New York, NY, United States, and have 1 advertising & marketing contacts listed on Kochava. According to their Ads.txt, The National Memo inventory partners include: pubmatic.com, openx.com, mantisadnetwork.com, lijit.com, indexexchange.com, improvedigital.com, google.com, emxdgt.com, e-planning.net, districtm.io, coxmt.com, conversantmedia.com, contextweb.com, aralego.com, appnexus.com, aolcloud.net, aol.com, advertising.com, adtech.com, 33across.com, udmserve.net, rubiconproject.com, spotx.tv, spotxchange.com, sharethrough.com, beachfront.com, lkqd.net, vidazoo.com, freewheel.tv, teads.tv, tremorhub.com, outbrain.com, lkqd.com, tribalfusion.com, exponential.com, fyber.com, smartadserver.com, synacor.com, engagebdr.com, my6sense.com, revcontent.com, video.unrulymedia.com, rhythmone.com, telaria.com, cedato.com, yahoo.com, ad-generation.jp, aps.amazon.com, ucfunnel.com, sovrn.com, sonobi.com, onetag.com, admanmedia.com, aniview.com, connatix.com, gumgum.com, advangelists.com, rockyou.net, brightroll.com, springserve.com, publishers.teads.tv, platform.videologygroup.com, sfx.freewheel.tv, rubicon.com, oath.com, altitudedigital.com, liveintent.com, adblade.com, criteo.com, amazon.com, btrll.com, undertone.com, thrive.plus, rtk.io, chocolateplatform.com, vdopia.com.
